description:

question: Will the Academy strip Will Smith’s Oscar by April 30?
description:
On the live broadcast of the 94th Academy Awards, actor Will Smith slapped the face of the host, Chris Rock, for making a joke about Jada Pinkett Smith, Will’s wife. Will Smith was subsequently awarded the Oscar for Best Actor for his performance in the film "King Richard".

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Academy of Motion Pictures Arts and Sciences (AMPAS) strips or otherwise voids Will Smith’s 2022 Oscar for Best Actor by April 30, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from AMPAS (https://www.oscars.org/oscars), however other credible reporting may be used.

question: Will Hunter Biden be federally indicted by July 31, 2022?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Hunter Biden, son of US President Joseph Biden, is indicted on federal charges or otherwise formally charged with any federal crime by the United States of America between March 28, 2022 and July 31, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the federal government of the United States (from sources such as https://www.fbi.gov/news/pressrel, https://www.justice.gov/news), however credible reporting may be used.

question: Will Kim Kardashian announce she’s pregnant by July 31, 2022?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kimberly Noel Kardashian (Kim Kardashian) announces that she is pregnant between March 28, 2022, and July 31, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution sources for this market will be Kim Kardashian’s verified social media accounts (https://twitter.com/KimKardashian, https://www.instagram.com/kimkardashian/, etc.), video footage of an announcement, a press release, an announcement through Kim Kardashian’s legal representative, however other credible reporting may be used.

This market will resolve “Yes” solely based on an announcement of pregnancy by Kim Kardashian. Any announcement originating from another person will not result in a “Yes” resolution. If it is later revealed Kim Kardashian was never pregnant after she announced she was pregnant, it will have no impact on the resolution of this market; only the announcement of pregnancy is necessary for a “Yes” resolution for this question.

question: Will Russia remain in G20 through November 1, 2022?
description:
The Group of 20 (G20) is an intergovernmental forum composed of 19 countries and the European Union. According to the G20 website, the forum represents 60% of the world's population, 80% of global GDP, and 75% of global exports. As of the writing of this market, the next scheduled convening of the G20 is on October 30, 2022.

This market asks whether the Russian Federation will remain in the G20 without interruption through November 1, 2022 (inclusive). 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Russian Federation remains a member of the G20 without interruption through November 1, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the Russian Federation ceases to be a member of the G20 for any length of time, this market will resolve to "No" regardless of later restoration of their membership.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from G20 (https://g20.org/about-the-g20/#participants), however other credible media may be consulted.
